website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy bag with a large capacity, perfect for a trip to the outdoors or for everyday use.
pros: Double stitching ensures that the bag will hold up well, even while seeing a lot of use
Can hold up to 3 days' worth of gear
cons: There have been complaints about the zippers breaking or getting stuck

customer_reviews.title: Great back pack.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new back pack for work because my old one started to fall apart on the inside. I work for UPS and I need to keep a lot of stuff on me every day. This back pack can hold a lot of stuff. Things that currently have in it are a set of rain gear, Ryobi radio with battery, tape gun, window cleaner, pens, info notices, Lysol wipes, my battery back up for my phone, and other ods and ends. The on thing I don’t like about this back pack is the straps to adjust the shoulders are not folded over and sewed so the don’t just come out if they are at the ends some how.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Rossi

customer_reviews.title: TOUGH
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack to make a family sized emergency kit and it did a great job housing all the supplies. It is about as large as you would want a backpack to get before it's just unwieldy to wear on your back when full. I think they picked a perfect size. Most importantly, this pack is TOUGH! I feel very confident that it wont break even though I loaded it up with many pounds of supplies and have it hanging in a closet by the top handle. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: A little hastily put together
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an X-mas gift for my nephew who will be traveling abroad soon. I have several MOLLE backpacks to compare. This one has long threads at the ends of the stitches like they couldn't be bothered to trim them all. The threads are long enough to be a nuisance. The pockets inside are few and flimsy. Over all I wasn't super impressed for the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I originally gave this a 5 star review back in 4/18 (see below). I have to revise it down to one due to the smell. I thought over time it'd get better but I am embarrassed to use it. Stinks so bad- don't want people to think it's body odor. I can't get in touch with customer service. I'd appreciate a replacement. Did you ever buy something, lift it out of the box and say "wow" out loud? Turn it over and say "niiiice"? How about... OK, you get the idea. This far exceeded my expectations in initial quality. Looks like a product that'll give lots of use. Be advised: it is kind of big for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony L

customer_reviews.title: Economical Backpack,  taking a Beating so far.....
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this Backpack for about 2 months now. It's being used as a "daily Commuter" Bag on a Train. AKA I'm trying really hard to beat & wear it out, on a daily basis. "High wear & tear". So far, this Bag has held up to the worst I've thrown at it, and into it. No failures of any kind to speak of. I love the "Pockets inside of Pockets" to keep Stuff organized. Train tickets / keys / wallet / work paperwork / Lunch. Yes, I will eventually succeed in "killing" this Bag, but at this price point, I would buy another one to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo

customer_reviews.title: Multipurpose uses!!
customer_reviews.text: I use my backpack for carting my drone and all of the stuff that goes with it. It is such a well made backpack I feel a little guilty that I'm not trekking up some mountain with it, but it works great just for a drone too. All of the straps allow it to be adjusted for tons of equipment or just a small load. It was the perfect purchase for me!
customer_reviews.author: PBJ

customer_reviews.title: Best backpack I’ve owned!
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack for a good price, quality is really good. Lots of room in the bag for whatever you need. I’m using it for school and it has plenty of room for all my books, binders, and even a laptop! Only con for me is that there isn’t a pouch on the outside for your water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy L

customer_reviews.title: For the price, a good buy
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. It seems tough, abrasion resistant, and sturdy. The zippers are “large tooth” so they don’t get stuck and hold tight. I am actually surprised at the amount of stuff that fits in there. It is not as big as the old style issued ALICE packs but it is definitely bigger than most “school use”, off the rack backpacks. For the price, a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bag!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a bug out bag. Very strong material. Molle attachment points everywhere. Zippers and buckles seem strong. 2 big compartments. 2 more on the back. Spot for hydration bladder as well. I've already added 2 pouches to the back. Only real compliant is the excessive slack in the straps.
customer_reviews.author: SW2

customer_reviews.title: Over priced
customer_reviews.text: I bought it in February and none of the zippers on the bag stay sealed now. They all come apart and my things fall out. 50 dollars is a very very steep price for a bag that doesn't survive more than a year of light use.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: This bag is awesome and an amazing value.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bag. Great value. Im using it to put together a bug out bag and this will work perfect. very sturdy and expandable. Plus the ability to add molle attachments is great.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Ogden

customer_reviews.title: I'm pretty happy with the backpack
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty happy with the backpack. I sort of wish it was just a little bit bigger but it will work. I use backpacks for traveling instead of a suitcase. I should be able to fit 2-3 days worth of clothes plus shampoo, deodorant, cologne, ect. I added my state flag patch next to the American flag patch. I have a name tape with my last name coming too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size. Well made with sturdy zippers
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Great size. Well made with sturdy zippers. Other backpack designs are rounded at the top, reducing space. This one is rectangular, top to bottom, provides more packing space. It looks like it will outlast me! Wadda buy! Great price & great product!
customer_reviews.author: jz

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money! Haven’t bought another back pack since.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this back pack, it’s great to take to theme parks holds a lot and does not run you the wrong way lots of padding.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Buying this was not a bad decision.
customer_reviews.text: Cool backpack. Pretty big and sturdy materials. Smells like a cat peed in it, though. I’ve had it a few weeks and it still smells. I believe it to be a smell produced during manufacturing. If you don’t sniff your backpacks and like strong, well made backpacks, you might like this one. Fits laptop, 2 changes of clothes, hydration pack, a few booksand I’ve still got enough room to pack lunch ...or a can of fabreeze.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This is a great EDC Bag. It is a very good size and not too big. I was worried that it would be to large to carry everyday to work. I even added addition MOLLE pouches to add more pockets. Very comfortable. No issues with straps. Has held up using everyday, and as carry on bag at the airport.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Dao

customer_reviews.title: 5 STARS
customer_reviews.text: Use it as my carry on when flying. Lots a convenient compartments. Very durable. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: USAJET

customer_reviews.title: The Best Backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is the best backpack I have ever owned. This is now my go bag. The 5 liters of extra space, compared to the other 35 liter packs, is amazing. This is truly the best backpack out there.
customer_reviews.author: Dale L. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: It reeks so bad I have hard time carrying it
customer_reviews.text: It's a functional bag for cheap price. But this bag comes with this weird chemical smell I cannot describe. It reeks so bad I have hard time carrying it. I didn't use it enough to test the durability but with this smell I am not planning on using it much.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Appeared to be of good quality, but the fabric on the zipper is ...
customer_reviews.text: Appeared to be of good quality, but the fabric on the zipper is already coming apart after only using it a half dozen times. Did not use it roughly or have it packed even near full.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Morris

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. $40 for a tactical bag is cheap. It is good quality, but has its flaws. The buckles notoriously slide off the straps. Other than that it’s fine.
customer_reviews.author: Trace Evans

customer_reviews.title: Good spacious well made backpack.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and spacious backpack. Well made and sturdy. Only minor annoyance is that the small chest straps tend to come lose and fall off on their own.
customer_reviews.author: Ike

customer_reviews.title: Works okay for range bag, but zippers suck
customer_reviews.text: Lots of compartments but zippers get stuck easily, and the little strings to help the zippers constantly fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: If you go camping or back packing, BUY this 1
customer_reviews.text: This military backpack has tons of room and can be used wherever you go. Awesome Military backpack!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Montoya

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good bag.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty great bag. I have had problems with the zipper strings coming apart and while walking with it a clip came off for the chest clip. Disappeared while using it. I like the bad though.
customer_reviews.author: John Owens

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 12 year old for school. He carries so many books. This is really roomy. His other backpack was breaking from all the stuff he had smashed in there. This pack works great and has plenty of room
customer_reviews.author: Kristen A

customer_reviews.title: Lots of storage, okay at this price point, issues with the chest strap
customer_reviews.text: Use it every day, kind of my mobile office. Overall it's sturdy, straps are well done, but both chest straps have let go on the pack strap end and are now gone on the ground somewhere, that standard loop design is't up to the job, doesn't retain when not under tension - which is a little bit of a pain. At this price point not an enormous issue, but still, it should work.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Zapp

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for a friend who wears it every day ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a friend who wears it every day! He absolutely loves it and raves about it. Probably going to get one for myself soon
customer_reviews.author: CpHaAiOnS

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is very similar to my previous backpack I bought years ago. Had lots of space and several pockets, with space to attach other bags or supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Strap slips
customer_reviews.text: Holds a lot of stuff but if moderately heavy, the adjustable strap on the right side kept slipping. That’s frustrating when you’re hurrying through an airport or walking for any distance. I also wish there was a side pocket for a water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: Best Backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is the best backpack for my high schooler. He has plenty of room for all of this books. I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: CMcLean

customer_reviews.title: the construction is still solid and the versatility of the pockets was excellent.
customer_reviews.text: One vacation later, the construction is still solid and the versatility of the pockets was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Hartmann

customer_reviews.title: Great range bag
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of room and pockets, seems well made. I'm using it as a range bag and it has space for everything I need or want at the range.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: I do like the backpack just wish the quality was better
customer_reviews.text: I have used this backpack for work and after 2 months of using it the Zippers on the two largest areas only zip one way now. I do like the backpack just wish the quality was better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: Love my backpack. Get compliments daily. It’s my every day carry and I have no problem fitting all of my things in it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Moss

customer_reviews.title: Good pack
customer_reviews.text: Great pack. I’m a professional driver. I use this pack daily as my shower bag. Been caring it for over a year now. With no problems. Great sturdy and holds everything I need.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong
customer_reviews.text: As a follow-up I've had the bag for a few weeks now and I absolutely love it it's durable for what I use which is camping with a tent and a camper it's good durable fabric thick padding and plenty of pockets absolutely a must have for a medium sized backpack
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a school bag for my kid. He likes it and works well
customer_reviews.author: Naqi Sheikh

customer_reviews.title: couldnt be happier high quality equipment for a much better price than ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using this backpack daily for work for 4 months now, couldnt be happier high quality equipment for a much better price than standard tactical gear.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Ok Bag....bad smell
customer_reviews.text: Seems like an ok bag,,,,but it did have an odor which permeates the house
customer_reviews.author: smartbassist

customer_reviews.title: Better then 5 stars for the price, love it
customer_reviews.text: Omg love this bag, great quality for the price wow very happy 5+ stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described wish the material was a little thicker. Will update the review in a few weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Marco C

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I am in law enforcement and use this as a go bag/office bag. Plenty of room and well made. No issues with this bag. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gym bag to bring a change of clothes and ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome gym bag to bring a change of clothes and a good travel bag for traveling for a few days.
customer_reviews.author: W. Bush

customer_reviews.title: Very roomey
customer_reviews.text: You can fit every thing you need in this one
customer_reviews.author: toytec

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack.  Husband Loves this!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say enough good about this backpack. My husband used it for travel. It expands to accommodate extra STUFF! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Tina Marie

customer_reviews.title: The bag is nice, functional and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: cant give it 5 stars. cant give it 1. The bag is nice, functional and comfortable. But, it smells like clothes that were left in the washing machine for 2-3 days. I sprayed it with Febreze...nothing. I'm going to pop it in the washing machine today and see if that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very accessible,strong material.
customer_reviews.text: More than enough room. Very rugged. Keep forgetting were I put things. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: darrellr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice bag for the price. Can't wait to use it!
customer_reviews.author: AdkMumbles

customer_reviews.title: Super strong reinforced stitching
customer_reviews.text: This heavy duty pack works wonders for boys who are hard on ALL other backpacks! Amazingly built, super strong and reinforced stitching makes it perfect to carry everything they need for school.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Jordan

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag! So far so good it has help up!
customer_reviews.author: J. Boone

customer_reviews.title: This is very well crafted and should last for years under every day use.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, extra stitching to handle more weight than you could ever put in it, multiple compartments to accommodate organizational needs for quick deployment, straps are well padded for long term carrying, velcro and tie off points located on outer shell for easy addition of extra stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie

customer_reviews.title: The backpack is good, but the straps (chest strap
customer_reviews.text: The backpack is good, but the straps (chest strap, and waist strap) are always coming undone and falling off. So far I've been lucky and found them, but it's just a mater of time until one comes off and gets lost.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Smith

customer_reviews.title: This was a great buy for me!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new backpack for riding my motorcycle. This backpack is nice and big! It holds everything that I need to have with me!
customer_reviews.author: kelly joseph kowalczyk jr

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 30 seconds
customer_reviews.text: If I could give zero stars, I would. Loosened all the straps. Put it on. Clicked the buckle on the waist strap. Pulled the straps snug. The buckle broke. Printing the return label now.
customer_reviews.author: Deguello

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who is in the military and the very first time he used it the zipper broke. Poorly constructed!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Serback

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the price. Zippers have broke on it and haven't made it through the school year yet. It does have lots of room and can carry a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Tia M. Renly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: In love with the quality of this backpack. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Hornedo

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Opened up the bag and it had a horrible smell that was nearly impossible to get out.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas P. Young

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a everyday bag to work, not even 1 month old and the zipper completley broke from one day to another. Very dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Great item!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag!!!!! Great, durable material. It has several storage areas and makes a great Triathlon Gear bag.
customer_reviews.author: Tim B.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son because he has an obnoxious amount of school books. Everything fits including his laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent backpack. Needs a sleeve or slim laptop bag ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent backpack. Needs a sleeve or slim laptop bag for laptop protection/padding but arrived right on time and was perfect for a last minute business trip.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Ludwig

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bag, bigger then expected
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag, bigger then expected. Exactly what I was looking for, quality of the bag is great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Bag came with a horrible smell took many washes to make it tolerable. I also paid for the American flag patch and did not receive it. Good heavy duty bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Anaya

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well designed Backpack with enough compartments that fits my laptop, books, gadgets and more....
customer_reviews.author: Josiah

customer_reviews.title: perfect! Bag is great and looks cool
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a tactical looking carry on.. perfect! Bag is great and looks cool. Would make a great day or hiking bag also. I was worried ordering it and being small, but I'm 6' 210lbs and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: george

customer_reviews.title: but it looks good and I will definitely find something to do with ...
customer_reviews.text: The bag itself was'nt exactly what I was expecting, I thought it was going to be a little smaller, but it looks good and I will definitely find something to do with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rudedog

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: APPEARS TO BE GOOD QUALITY...PROOF WILL BE WHEN I ABUSE IT
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD ESCOTT

customer_reviews.title: Pro- Great bag, lots of room and seems pretty rigid ...
customer_reviews.text: Pro- Great bag, lots of room and seems pretty rigid and durable. Con- Smells like it's soaked in cat piss.
customer_reviews.author: jesse lynch

customer_reviews.title: Great looking backpack
customer_reviews.text: Definitely an awesome backpack! I have been using military backpacks since I was in the Army and always try to look for the tough ones, this one seems to hold very well, it does hold a 3-5 days supplies so over all I’m happy with this backpack, Yosemite is my backyard so I will be testing it and if doesn’t hold up well I will be updating this, if I don’t it means it’s tough!!
customer_reviews.author: MONTYHADES

customer_reviews.title: The backpack smelt terrible when it arrived
customer_reviews.text: The backpack smelt terrible when it arrived. I had to wash it twice and the string on the zippers aren't tied well and pretty much all fell off. The bag smells ok now but I have to essentially recreate 5 zippers. Wasn't worth the hassle. Also very surprised by the smell.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Don’t expect to pack this tac-pack as normal, or plan for continuous use
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this tac pack for two months and the majority of the stitching for all compartments/storage are opening up. Thought this would be a good pack but seems that it’s made more to be aesthetically pleasing to the eye than practical and durable. If Reebow Gear believes this is a fluke/defective item and does not meet their standards, I would be happy for them to exchange it. If they choose not to exchange this defective pack then all whom are considering their items be very weary of their products and company standards.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: The bag smells. As soon as I took it ...
customer_reviews.text: The bag smells. As soon as I took it out of the package it had an odor. Almost as if it was used and was left out in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Smelled !!
customer_reviews.text: Smelled like cat piss !! Good size. A lot of reviews attacked quality. Just sent back so have no idea of how long it will last
customer_reviews.author: Bw45069

product_meta.title: REEBOW GEAR Military Tactical Backpack, Large Army 3 Day Assault Pack Molle Bug Out Bag Backpacks Black
product_meta.description:
Desc.:Military Tactical Backpack, Large Army 3 Day Assault Pack Bug Out Bag Backpacks. 
Military Tactical backpack size approx.:13"*20"*11" / 33*50.5*28CM (W*H*D),Capacity: 40L; 
Military backpack is made of high quality fabric, durable. 
Molle tactical backpack has molle system, 
Molle webbing throughout for attaching additional tactical pouches or gear as 3 days assault pack bug out bag heavy duty backpack.
Tactical assault pack backpack with double-stitched, Heavy duty zippers and utility-style cord pulls. 
Side and front load compression system, Ventilated mesh padded back area & shoulder strap,breathable and comfortable.
Tactical backpack has hydration compatible pocket on the back that works great for 2.5L/3L hydration bladder as hydration backpack or outdoor camping hiking backpack.
Notice: backpack didn't include hydration bladder.
Tactical assault pack backpack can be used as 3 day assault pack, bug out bag backpack, 
range bag, hunting backpack, survival backpack, army backpack, school backpack or daypack for daily use.
feature_bullets: Military Tactical backpack size approx.:13"*20"*11" / 33*50.5*28CM (W*H*D),Capacity: 40L; Military backpack is made of 600x600D polyester fabric.
Tactical assault backpack has molle system, Molle webbing throughout for attaching additional tactical pouches or gear as 3 day assault pack bug out bag backpack molle hunting backpack.

Military assault pack backpack with double-stitched, Heavy duty zippers and utility-style cord pulls, Side and front load compression system, Ventilated mesh padded back area & shoulder strap,breathable and comfortable.
Military backpack has hydration compatible that works great for a hydration bladder (backpack didn't include hydration bladder) as hydration backpack or outdoor camping hiking backpack.

Tactical assault pack backpack can be used as 3 day assault pack, bug out bag backpack, heavy duty backpack, hunting backpack, survival backpack, army backpack, school backpack or daypack for daily use
